duties_responsibilities.duty: Recruit, manage, and retain schools and Middle School partners for the implementation of evidence-based programs.
Research evidence-based program implementation activities in collaboration with the evaluation team.
Facilitate the implementation of linkage relationships between partnering schools and local clinics.
Promote the work of NYCTC at Agency-wide meetings and professional conferences.
Liaise with schools, community and school-based clinics, and other implementation partners to facilitate data collection efforts.
Support implementing the Parent Engagement initiative to increase parents’ capacity to talk with their youth about sexual health.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in public health or relevant field (Master’s preferred)
